destinations.name: LANDSCAPES OF KARNATAKA

details.description: LANDSCAPES OF KARNATAKA is a blissful journey through the lush green valleys of Coorg and Chikmagalur whilst witnessing some other charms of these regions.
details.excludes: Rail / bus / air fare and food during rail / bus / air travel
details.bookingProcedure: Advance payment Rs. 8,875 (incl GST) per person. Balance payment 20 days prior to the departure date.

itinerary.title: Day 1 - Udupi (1 night)
itinerary.description: Pick up at Udupi railway / bus station - Head towards Hotel Chithara Comforts - Check in followed by lunch - Take blessings at the Sri Krishna Math - Head towards Malpe beach for a scenic sunset - Back to the hotel - Dinner - Rest up

itinerary.title: Day 2 - Coorg (3 nights)
itinerary.description: Check out from Hotel Chithara Comforts after breakfast - Travel to Coorg - Check in at Capitol Village followed by lunch - After a short rest head towards Abbey falls - Shop at the Coorg market for coffee, spices, clothing and more - Back to the hotel - Dinner - Rest up

itinerary.title: Day 3 - Coorg
itinerary.description: Breakfast - Leave for Mandalpatti peak to witness a breathtaking view - Head back to the hotel for lunch - After a few moments of rest travel to Omkareshwar temple - End the day at Raja's Seat enjoying the sunset amidst a garden - Back to the hotel - Dinner - Rest up

itinerary.title: Day 4 - Coorg
itinerary.description: Breakfast - Head towards Talakaveri temple to witness the origin of the sacred river Cauvery - Move towards Bhagamandala temple - Head back to the hotel for lunch - After a short rest travel to the Dubare Elephant Camp to experience a memorable time with the elephants - Back to the hotel - Gather around a campfire for some relaxation pre or post dinner - Rest up

itinerary.title: Day 5 - Chikmagalur (2 nights)
itinerary.description: Check out of Capitol Village after breakfast - Travel to Chikmagalur - Check in at Hotel Blue Pearl followed by lunch - After a short rest head towards Jhari falls via Jeep - Back to the hotel - Dinner - Rest up

itinerary.title: Day 6 - Chikmagalur
itinerary.description: Breakfast - Leave for Devaramane Betta to enjoy a panoramic view - Head back to the hotel for lunch - After few moments of rest visit Baba Budangiri, another scenic and historic place - Back to hotel - Dinner - Rest up

itinerary.title: Day 7 - Mangalore
itinerary.description: Check out post breakfast - Head towards Mangalore airport or Mangalore railway / bus station for dropping

includesDetails: Pickup from Udupi railway/bus station station & drop off at Mangalore airport or railway/bus station
Sightseeing & Entry tickets as per itinerary
excludesDetails: Anything not mentioned in the include section
